item.title: Ali add a quote by Freidrich Neitzsche
item.description: "The true man wants two things: danger and play. For that reason he wants woman, as the most dangerous plaything." -- Freidrich Neitzsche

item.title: Ali add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "We have art in order not to die of the truth." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Ali add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Today as always, men fall into two groups: slaves and free men. Whoever does not have two-thirds of his day for himself, is a slave, whatever he may be: a statesman, a businessman, an official, or a scholar." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Ali add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Ali add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Ali add a quote by Harold Rosenberg
item.description: "cease to regard the canvas as a surface on which to paint a picture, but instead as a surface on which to record an event" -- Harold Rosenberg

item.title: Ali add a quote by Philip Roth
item.description: "The only obsession everyone wants: 'love.' People think that in falling in love they make themselves whole? The Platonic union of souls? I think otherwise. I think you're whole before you begin. And the love fractures you. You're whole, and then you're cracked open. " -- Philip Roth

item.title: Ali add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "The struggle of man against power is the struggle of memory against forgetting" -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Ali add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Yes, it's crazy. Love is either crazy or it's nothing at all." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Ali add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Happiness is the longing for repetition." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Ali add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "On the surface, an intelligible lie; underneath, the unintelligible truth." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Ali add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "When a woman loves you she's not satisfied until she possesses your soul. Because she's weak, she has a rage for domination, and nothing less will satisfy her." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Ali add a quote by Arthur Schopenhauer
item.description: "Every miserable fool who has nothing at all of which he can be proud, adopts as a last resource pride in the nation to which he belongs; he is ready and happy to defend all its faults and follies tooth and nail, thus reimbursing himself for his own inferiority." -- Arthur Schopenhauer

item.title: Ali add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Never regret thy fall, O Icarus of the fearless flight For the greatest tragedy of them all Is never to feel the burning light." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ali add a quote by Jean Cocteau
item.description: "Le cinéma, c'est l'écriture moderne dont l'encre est la lumière." -- Jean Cocteau

item.title: Ali add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot." -- John Lennon

item.title: Ali add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A man's face is his autobiography. A woman's face is her work of fiction." -- Oscar Wilde
